name: undiscussed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not talked about: The subject went virtually undiscussed for half a century after the war ended. He now realises that her undiscussed absences had made him question her love.
More examplesFewer examplesThis might be the most important undiscussed issue in the media today.Much has changed for the better, but some of the deepest problems remain not merely unresolved but undiscussed.Some changing of birthdates enabled her to bring him up as her own - an undiscussed family secret.
